evidence.title: v1.9.7
evidence.excerpt: ## Bug Fixes - **one**: support cssCodeSplit: false by reading style.css from manifest ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/668400885f330016217ca143458a54ca0a45bf18)) - **one**: dev mode also accepts last port value if multiple given ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/c8b01cfbce252b2fa620a1b69fabfbe10d79b561)) ## Commits - fb35d90: v1.9.7 (natew)

evidence.title: v1.9.6
evidence.excerpt: ## Bug Fixes - correct filename casing for filterPluginsForNative.d.ts ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/dfe2397d89eb56ae390782cb1859e5dc4e44e407)) - add root postinstall to build if dist missing ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/b3640de00d85326e34493419acd86a24668b38d2)) - make example postinstall fail silently in CI ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/879b1495b43a61ce41b6f8e7307469ccb17c0bf2)) - bump security resolutions and fix test.fixme ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/9585530c870ba0fb63ba888089772f824757a5a5)) - remove minimatch resolution (breaks depcheck) ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/7608a9769118fb0c4eebbbaebaf27399287f2754)) - regenerate lockfile for tamagui rc.16 upgrade ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/d9832e2ee11125b95bb161ea56f1e568bb623091)) - **compiler**: treat NODE_ENV=test as production mode ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/68a84729edcf6c631fae058714886b1fd52fa6c7)) - **compiler**: use config.command for production detection ([natew](https://github.com/onejs/one/commit/f235fe9747e33694bb7aa5d7dea4d286e7e04186)) - **cli**: handle duplicate CLI args correctly ([natew](https://github.â€¦
